remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 如果指定字串可以成功剖析為 WQL 查詢，則視為查詢字串，否則會假設其為查詢的來源物件路徑。

span.span: If the specified string can be successfully parsed as a WQL query, it is considered to be the query string; otherwise, it is assumed to be the path of the source object for the query.

summary.span: 在這個狀況中，查詢會假設為執行個體 (Instance) 查詢。

span.span: In this case, the query is assumed to be an instances query.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ClassDefinitionsOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出只有相關關係性物件的類別定義才會傳回。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating that only the class definitions of the relevant relationship objects be returned.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出只有相關關聯性物件的類別定義才會傳回。

span.span: Returns a value indicating that only the class definitions of the relevant relationship objects be returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 副作用，查詢字串會重建以反映新的旗標。As a side-effect, the query string is rebuilt to reflect the new flag. ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果查詢要求的結果集; 的唯一類別定義，否則， `false`。`true` if the query requests only class definitions of the result set; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsSchemaQuery { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出這個查詢是否為結構描述查詢或執行個體查詢。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this query is a schema query or an instance query.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出這項查詢是否為結構描述查詢。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether this query is a schema query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的查詢類型。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new query type. ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果此查詢應該評估結構描述。`false`如果應評估查詢，為整個執行個體。`true` if this query should be evaluated over the schema; `false` if the query should be evaluated over instances. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
